nodes.name: mintToken

nodes.documentation:
DelegateCalls the Token contract
@param data Data to send as msg.data
It should include the signature and the parameters of the function to be called, as described in
https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/v0.4.24/abi-spec.html#function-selector-and-argument-encoding.
nodes.name: callToken

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The amount must be larger than zero"

nodes.name: mintToken

nodes.documentation:
DelegateCalls the Token contract
@param data Data to send as msg.data
It should include the signature and the parameters of the function to be called, as described in
https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/v0.4.24/abi-spec.html#function-selector-and-argument-encoding.
nodes.name: callToken

params.data: Data to send as msg.data It should include the signature and the parameters of the function to be called, as described in https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/v0.4.24/abi-spec.html#function-selector-and-argument-encoding.

mintToken(uint256).details: Deploys new Token contract with the Minter and the Pauser roles set to the Collaboration, mint tokens to the Collaboration and, finally, emits TokenMint event

returns._0: true if the Tokens have been mint.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
